data.message:
Todos Juntos Por João Rafael Kovalski
 please, I am from Brazil, I´m part of a huge group of people looking for a two-year-old boy named João Rafael Kovalski. You guys need to help us to publicize his picture on facebook.... he was kidnapped since august 14 th...he has a heart condition and needs urgently medication!!!! for God´s sake help us to show his face to the world....he may be anywhere..........Todos Juntos Por João Rafael Kovalski
